community_chest.name: Back Error
community_chest.description: Back error in your favor. Collect $200

community_chest.name: Sale of Stock
community_chest.description: From sale of stock you get $50.

community_chest.name: Get out of Jail
community_chest.description: Get Out of Jail Free. This card may be kept until needed or sold/traded.

community_chest.name: Go to Jail
community_chest.description: Go directly to jail. Do not pass Go, Do not collect $200.

community_chest.name: Grand Opera Night
community_chest.description: Grand Opera Night. Collect $50 from every player for opening night seats.

community_chest.name: Birthday
community_chest.description: It is your birthday. Collect $10 from every player.

community_chest.name: Street Repairs
community_chest.description: You are assessed for street repairs: Pay $40 per house and $115 per hotel you own.

community_chest.name: Beauty Contest
community_chest.description: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10.

chance.name: Advance to Illinois Ave
chance.description: Advance to Illinois Ave. If you pass Go, collect $200.

chance.name: Advance to St Charles Place
chance.description: Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go, collect $200.

chance.name: Advance to Utility
chance.description: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times the amount thrown.

chance.name: Advance to Railroad 1
chance.description: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

chance.name: Advance to Railroad 2
chance.description: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

chance.name: Get out of Jail
chance.description: Get out of Jail Free. This card may be kept until needed, or traded/sold.

chance.name: Go to Jail
chance.description: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail. Do not pass Go, do not collect $200.

chance.name: Property Repairs
chance.description: Make general repairs on all your property: For each house pay $25, For each hotel pay $100.

chance.name: Advance to Reading Railroad
chance.description: Take a trip to Reading Railroad. If you pass Go, collect $200.

chance.name: Advance to Boardwalk
chance.description: Take a walk on the Boardwalk. Advance token to Boardwalk.

chance.name: Chairman of the Board
chance.description: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.

chance.name: Crossword Competition
chance.description: You have won a crossword competition. Collect $100.
